What about yuri?

As a completely depraved fuck, this is everything I wanted after the third installment. First and foremost, we need an English translation for both the third chapter as well as this one. It does take forever for each of these chapters to come out, but I'm hoping for like the exact opposite of what someone else said: M O R E.

Give me a fifth installment. Give me an even fatter MC - the shot of her kneeling with cum flowing out on page 26 is fucking amazing, but I want even bigger tits, thighs, and a rounder belly. Give me the MC totally falling into depravity, becoming completely cock-addicted and totally leaving behind her friends for sex. Give me all of the dark shit - weight gain, mind break, cock addiction, gangbang, pregnancy, all of it. Each chapter is darker than the last, let the next one be dark as all hell!

She/they deserve a good ending.

Each of these chapters take forever to come out, and all I want is that she survives it all and gets a happy ending with male and female friend: getting friendship back and getting together with one of them.
